item.title: Refactoring functional code
item.description: With my pairing mate we have refactored this piece of functional code. Original code: function filterTokens (rawTokens) { const cleanedTokens = rawTokens.map(token => (token.length && token[0] === '-') ? token.substring(1) : token) return cleanedTokens.filter(token => token !== '' && stopWordsArray.indexOf(token) === -1) } Refactored code: function filterTokens (rawTokens) { const cleanedTokens = rawTokens.map(token => startsWithADash(token) ? removeDashFrom(token) : token) const processedTokens = cleanedTokens.filter(token => isNotEmpty(token) && isNotAStopWord(token)) return processedTokens function startsWithADash (token) { return (token.
